record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 10 A.M. TOMORROW

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, if there is no further business today, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 5:35 p.m., adjourned until Tuesday, January 30, 2007, at 10 a.m.
